setting.name: external-address
setting.label: External address
setting.description: The ITSP facing address. The ITSP will send signaling here.

setting.name: external-port
setting.label: External port
setting.description: The ITSP facing port. The ITSP will send signaling here.

setting.name: local-address
setting.description: The SIPX proxy facing address. The SIPX proxy will send signaling here.

setting.name: local-port
setting.description: The SIPX proxy facing port. The SIPX proxy will send signaling here.

setting.name: stun-server-address
setting.label: STUN server
setting.description: The stun server address used to determine the global address of the bridge.

setting.name: sip-keepalive-seconds
setting.label: Signaling keep-alive interval
setting.description: Keepalive timer for SIP Signaling. sipXbridge will re-register with each ITSP to keep the NAT pinhole open

setting.name: media-keepalive-seconds
setting.label: Media keep-alive interval
setting.description: Keepalive timer for RTP. Each RTP stream facing the ITSP will start a timer that runs with this timeout (in seconds).

setting.name: xml-rpc-port
setting.label: API port
setting.description: Port for external XML/RPC requests to be directed. If not specified, the XML RPC server is not started.

setting.name: max-number-of-concurrent-calls
setting.label: Maximum calls
setting.description: The maximum number of concurrent calls allowed via the given bridge overall. When the limit is reached, sipxbridge will return "Service Unavailable". If nothing is specified, no limit is placed on the max number of concurrent calls.

setting.name: music-on-hold-support-enabled
setting.label: Music on hold
setting.description: If checked sipXbridge Music On Hold support is enabled. Phones should disable their MOH support if sipXbridge support for MOH is enabled.

setting.name: rtp-port-range-start
setting.label: Start RTP port
setting.description: Start of the RTP ports range.

setting.name: rtp-port-range-end
setting.label: End RTP port
setting.description: End of the RTP ports range.

setting.name: allowed-codec-name
setting.label: Allowed Codec Name
setting.description: The codec for the SDP Offer that is allowable. Because sipxbridge does not support media transcoding, in to support call transfers, we need to restrict the all codec for call setups in the SDP offer to this value.

setting.name: log-level
setting.label: Logging level
setting.description: Log configuration. Defaults to INFO level.

setting.name: log-directory
setting.description: Log directory. The log file name is hard coded to "sipxbridge.log".
